movie.title: The Blue Flower of Novalis
movie.description_intro: In his apartment in São Paulo, between making coffee and gay hook-ups, Marcelo casually and sincerely discussed his longings and beliefs.
movie.description_full: In his apartment in São Paulo, between making coffee and gay hook-ups, Marcelo casually and sincerely discussed his longings and beliefs.

movies.title: Singam 3
movies.summary: Following the prequel, Duraisingam is transferred to Mangalore to investigate the death of the commissioner. In that process he gets involved with Australian toxic waste dealing mafia. Also Duraisingam discovers that Australian mafia is involved in this. The rest of the story is how Duraisingam catches the culprit though he face many work pressures and political pressures

movies.title: The Hill
movies.summary: World War II, in a British disciplinary camp located in the Libyan desert, prisoners are persecuted by Staff Sergeant Williams (Ian Hendry), who made them climb again and again, under the heavy sun, an artificial hill built right in the middle of the camp. Harris (Ian Bannen) is a more human and compassionate guard, but the chief, R.S.M. Wilson (Harry Andrews), refuses to disown his subordinate Williams. One day, five new prisoners arrive. Each of them will deal in a different way with the authority and Williams' ferocity.

movies.title: The Man with the Iron Heart
movies.title_english: The Man with the Iron Heart
movies.title_long: The Man with the Iron Heart (2017)
movies.summary: 1942: The Third Reich is at its peak. The Czech resistance in London decides to plan the most ambitious military operation of WWII: Anthropoid. Two young recruits in their late twenties, Jozef Gabcik and Jan Kubis, are sent to Prague to assassinate the most ruthless Nazi leader - Reich-protector Reinhard Heydrich, Head of the SS, the Gestapo, and the architect of the "Final Solution".

movies.title: The Strangers: Prey at Night
movies.summary: A family's road trip takes a dangerous turn when they arrive at a secluded mobile home park to stay with some relatives and find it mysteriously deserted. Under the cover of darkness, three masked psychopaths pay them a visit to test the family's every limit as they struggle to survive.
